/* 
based on stockfish midgame piece evaluations
PawnValueMg = 128, 
KnightValueMg = 781,
BishopValueMg = 825, 
RookValueMg = 1276, 
QueenValueMg = 2538,
*/var pieceValues=new Map();// Black
pieceValues['p']=128;pieceValues['n']=781;pieceValues['b']=825;pieceValues['r']=1276;pieceValues['q']=2538;pieceValues['k']=9999;// White
pieceValues['P']=-128;pieceValues['N']=-781;pieceValues['B']=-825;pieceValues['R']=-1276;pieceValues['Q']=-2538;pieceValues['K']=-9999;// returns total piece values
var getBoardEvaluation=function getBoardEvaluation(fen){var count=0;for(var i=0;i<fen.length;i++){// Breaks after pieces string ends. All fens have a space after board declaration
if(fen.charAt(i)===" ")break;if(pieceValues[fen.charAt(i)]!==undefined)count+=pieceValues[fen.charAt(i)];}return count;};export default getBoardEvaluation;
